name: Dice Tower Tower Defense (DTTD)
description:
One boring day working at CASH AND SLAY CASINO, your co-worker challenges to a life and death battle of DICE TOWER TOWER DEFENSE (DTTD)! Place various items from across the casino to create your precious tower. Carefully place archers, who will protect it from the growing onslaught of dice! Save yourself from being one of those guys who die in a casino and win DICE TOWER TOWER DEFENSE!

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022!! We missed the deadline by exactly a second, but hey, it's still here!
